title: New class wizard doesn't get context right for nested classes
OB: When using the new class wizard with a .java file open in the editor and selecting the option 'Enclosing Type', the field is blank.
EB: The 'Enclosing Type' field should default to the currently selected type in the editor.
SR: Ensure that the 'Enclosing Type' field in the new class wizard defaults to the type that is currently open in the editor.
